name: IBM Cloud Private Standard Installation - 1M1P3W
description: This template will deploy a standard instance of IBM Cloud Private with 1 Master, 1 Proxy and 3 Worker Nodes

metadata.displayName: Standard Deployment of IBM Cloud Private - 1M1P3W
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a standard instance of IBM Cloud Private with 1 Master, 1 Proxy and 3 Worker Nodes

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
The Installation-type needs five Virtual Machines (5 VMs)
Virtual Machine 1 : IBM Cloud Private Boot/Master Node
Virtual Machine 2 : IBM Cloud Private Proxy Node
Virtual Machine 3 : IBM Cloud Private Worker1-Nodes
Virtual Machine 4 : IBM Cloud Private Worker2-Node
Virtual Machine 5 : IBM Cloud Private Worker3-Node

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
• Boot/Master-Node: vCPU 16, Memory (GB) 32, Disk (GB) 500
  • Proxy-Node: vCPU 8, Memory (GB) 16, Disk (GB) 200
  • Worker-Node1,2,3: vCPU 2, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 100

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
  3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
